books.author: by Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.description: Jack Reacher intervenes on an ambush in Tennessee and uncovers a conspiracy.
books.name: THE SENTINEL

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The third book in the Jake Brigance series. A 16-year-old is accused of killing a deputy in Clanton, Miss., in 1990.
books.name: A TIME FOR MERCY

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A doctor serving in the Navy in Afghanistan goes back to North Carolina where two women change his life.
books.name: THE RETURN

books.author: by James Patterson and Shan Serafin
books.description: Detective Sean Walsh must solve a case involving three missing women who had access to a home where a man was murdered.
books.name: THREE WOMEN DISAPPEAR

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The 55th book in the Stone Barrington series. A criminal mastermind turns out to be a person of influence.
books.name: SHAKEUP

books.author: by Fannie Flagg
books.description: Bud Threadgoode returns to his hometown and sets off some life-changing events.
books.name: THE WONDER BOY OF WHISTLE STOP

books.author: by Tana French
books.description: After a divorce, a former Chicago police officer resettles in an Irish village where a boy goes missing.
books.name: THE SEARCHER

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: An 18-year-old who wants to become a police officer falls in love with a young woman who has an aggressive form of cancer.
books.name: TRULY, MADLY, DEEPLY

books.author: by V.E. Schwab
books.description: A Faustian bargain comes with a curse that affects the adventure Addie LaRue has across centuries.
books.name: THE INVISIBLE LIFE OF ADDIE LARUE

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: In a prequel to “The Pillars of the Earth,” a boatbuilder, a Norman noblewoman and a monk live in England under attack by the Welsh and the Vikings.
books.name: THE EVENING AND THE MORNING

books.author: by Richard Paul Evans
books.description: An editor of a publishing house inherits her father’s bookstore and receives letters from an anonymous source.
books.name: THE NOEL LETTERS

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.
books.name: ANXIOUS PEOPLE

books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by Eloisa James
books.description: The Duke of Lindow, who has a castle and eight children, determines to woo Lady Astley.
books.name: MY LAST DUCHESS

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: The final installment of the trilogy that includes “Winter in Paradise” and “What Happens in Paradise.”
books.name: TROUBLES IN PARADISE
